page.title: 03CHALFONT AREA SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: {Sports centre} Our local Sports Centre was opened on 19 Mar. '76.About 14 {schools} use it for their activities.The club-room and bar can be hired for parties and meetings.The courses run last between 5-13 weeks.There are 11 full time and about 50 part time staff, who work shifts all week including weekends.Some of the sports taught are badminton, judo and a variety of water activities. 17 of the courses involve dry sport and 51 water.There is also a {chess} club and outside the game can be played on a huge board with giant pieces. The centre is only closed on three days a year.It serves the community well and is a great asset.
